About.title: About Us
About.heroTitle: Building the Future of E-Commerce in Bulgaria
About.heroSubtitle: We're on a mission to make online shopping accessible, affordable, and delightful for everyone. Since 2010, we've been connecting Bulgarian shoppers with the world's best products.
About.missionDesc: We start with the customer and work backwards. We work vigorously to earn and keep customer trust. Although leaders pay attention to competitors, they obsess over customers.
About.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide every decision we make
About.valueCustomerFirstDesc: Every decision starts with the question: how does this benefit our customers?
About.valueTrustDesc: We build long-term relationships through transparent practices and honest communication.
About.valueInnovationDesc: We constantly improve our technology and services to serve you better.
About.valueSustainabilityDesc: We're committed to reducing our environmental footprint and promoting sustainable practices.
About.whatWeOfferSubtitle: Everything you need for a seamless shopping experience
About.offerFastDeliveryDesc: Same-day and next-day delivery options available across Bulgaria. Free shipping on orders over 50 лв.
About.offerQualityDesc: All products are verified authentic. If it's not genuine, we'll refund double your money.
About.offerSupportDesc: Our team of specialists is available 24/7 to help with any questions or concerns.
About.ctaSubtitle: Join millions of satisfied customers who trust us for their online shopping needs.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.introNotice: This Privacy Policy describes how AMZN Bulgaria EOOD ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and shares your personal information when you use our website and services.
Privacy.introText: At AMZN, we take your privacy seriously. This policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your personal data. By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
Privacy.infoCollectDesc:
We collect several types of information to provide and improve our services:

• Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, shipping and billing addresses when you create an account or place an order.

• Payment Information: Credit card details, bank account information (processed securely through our payment providers).

• Usage Data: Browser type, IP address, pages visited, time spent on pages, and other diagnostic data.

• Device Information: Hardware model, operating system, unique device identifiers, and mobile network information.

• Location Data: With your consent, we may collect location data to provide delivery estimates and local services.
Privacy.howWeUseDesc:
We use your personal information for the following purposes:

• To process and fulfill your orders, including shipping and delivery.

• To communicate with you about orders, accounts, products, services, and promotional offers.

• To personalize your shopping experience and recommend products.

• To improve our website, products, and services based on your feedback and usage patterns.

• To detect, prevent, and address fraud, security issues, and technical problems.

• To comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms of service.
Privacy.dataSharingDesc:
We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data with:

• Service Providers: Companies that help us operate our business (payment processors, shipping carriers, customer service providers).

• Business Partners: Sellers and brands whose products you purchase through our platform.

• Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights, safety, or property.

• Business Transfers: In connection with mergers, acquisitions, or sale of assets.

All third parties are contractually obligated to protect your information.
Privacy.cookiesDesc:
We use cookies and similar technologies to:

• Remember your preferences and login status.
• Analyze site traffic and usage patterns.
• Personalize content and advertisements.
• Provide social media features.

You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings. Note that disabling cookies may affect site functionality.
Privacy.dataSecurityDesc:
We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information:

• SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmissions.
• PCI DSS compliance for payment processing.
• Regular security audits and penetration testing.
• Access controls and employee training.
• Secure data centers with 24/7 monitoring.

While we strive to protect your data, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.
Privacy.dataRetentionDesc:
We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to:

• Provide our services and fulfill your orders.
• Comply with legal and regulatory requirements.
• Resolve disputes and enforce our agreements.
• Improve our services based on aggregated, anonymized data.

You can request deletion of your account and personal data at any time, subject to legal retention requirements.
Privacy.yourRightsDesc:
Under applicable data protection laws, you have the right to:

• Access: Request a copy of your personal data.
• Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete information.
• Erasure: Request deletion of your personal data.
• Portability: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format.
• Objection: Object to processing of your data for marketing purposes.
• Restriction: Request limited processing of your data.

To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@amzn.bg.
Privacy.notificationsDesc:
We may send you:

• Transactional Emails: Order confirmations, shipping updates, account notifications.
• Marketing Communications: Promotional offers, newsletters, product recommendations (with your consent).

You can opt out of marketing communications at any time by clicking 'Unsubscribe' in any email or updating your account preferences.
Privacy.questionsDesc: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.importantNotice: Please read these terms carefully before using our services. By accessing or using AMZN, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.
Terms.introText: Welcome to AMZN. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of our website, mobile applications, and services. By using our services, you accept these Terms in full. If you disagree with any part of these Terms, you may not use our services.
Terms.acceptanceDesc:
By accessing or using AMZN services, you confirm that:

• You are at least 18 years old or have parental consent.
• You have the legal capacity to enter into binding agreements.
• You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
• You accept our Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy.

We may update these Terms at any time. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.
Terms.useOfServiceDesc:
You may use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to:

• Violate any applicable laws or regulations.
• Infringe on the rights of others.
• Submit false or misleading information.
• Interfere with or disrupt our services.
• Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems.
• Use automated means to access our services without permission.

We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason.
Terms.accountDesc:
When you create an account, you agree to:

• Provide accurate, current, and complete information.
• Maintain the security of your password and account.
• Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.
• Accept responsibility for all activities under your account.

We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms or for suspected fraudulent activity.
Terms.ordersDesc:
By placing an order, you agree that:

• All orders are subject to acceptance and availability.
• Prices and availability may change without notice.
• We reserve the right to limit quantities.
• We may refuse or cancel orders for any reason.
• Product descriptions are accurate to the best of our knowledge.

Once an order is placed, you will receive a confirmation email. This does not guarantee acceptance of your order.
Terms.paymentsDesc:
We accept various payment methods as displayed at checkout. By making a purchase:

• You authorize us to charge your selected payment method.
• You confirm the payment information is accurate and complete.
• You agree to pay all applicable taxes and fees.
• All prices are in Bulgarian Lev (лв) unless otherwise stated.

Payment is required at the time of purchase. We use secure, PCI-compliant payment processing.
Terms.shippingDesc:
Delivery times and costs vary based on:

• Shipping destination and method selected.
• Product availability and order processing time.
• External factors (weather, holidays, carrier delays).

We provide estimated delivery dates but cannot guarantee specific delivery times. Risk of loss passes to you upon delivery to the carrier.

Free shipping is available on qualifying orders over 50 лв.
Terms.returnsPolicyDesc:
We offer a 30-day return policy on most items. To be eligible for a return:

• Items must be unused and in original packaging.
• You must have proof of purchase.
• Certain items are non-returnable (see Returns page).

Refunds are processed to the original payment method within 5-10 business days of receiving the returned item.
Terms.prohibitedDesc:
You may not use our services to:

• Engage in fraudulent activities or identity theft.
• Sell counterfeit or stolen goods.
• Violate intellectual property rights.
• Harass, abuse, or harm others.
• Distribute malware or harmful content.
• Manipulate reviews or ratings.
• Circumvent security measures.

Violation may result in account termination and legal action.
Terms.intellectualDesc:
All content on our platform is protected by intellectual property laws:

• Trademarks, logos, and brand elements are our property.
• Product images and descriptions may be owned by sellers.
• User-generated content remains your property but grants us usage rights.

You may not copy, modify, or distribute our content without permission.
Terms.liabilityDesc:
To the fullest extent permitted by law:

• We provide services "as is" without warranties of any kind.
• We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
• Our liability is limited to the amount you paid for the product or service.
• We are not responsible for third-party seller actions.

This limitation does not affect your statutory rights as a consumer.
Terms.disputesDesc:
In case of disputes:

• We encourage you to contact our customer service first.
• Disputes will be governed by Bulgarian law.
• Any legal proceedings shall be conducted in Sofia, Bulgaria.
• EU consumers may use the Online Dispute Resolution platform.

We aim to resolve all disputes amicably before legal action.
Terms.changesDesc:
We may modify these Terms at any time:

• Changes will be posted on this page with an updated date.
• Significant changes will be notified via email or site notice.
• Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.
• Previous versions are available upon request.

We recommend reviewing these Terms periodically.
Terms.questionsDesc: If you have questions about these Terms or need legal clarification, our team is here to help.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.heroSubtitle: Have a question or need assistance? Our customer service team is available 7 days a week to ensure you have the best shopping experience.
Contact.trackOrderDesc: View order status and delivery updates
Contact.paymentIssuesDesc: Help with charges, refunds, and payment methods
Contact.productQuestionsDesc: Get answers about products and availability
Contact.sendMessageDesc: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours

Contact.orderNumberHint: If your inquiry is about a specific order, please include the order number
Contact.subject: Subject
Contact.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your question or issue in detail. Include any relevant information that will help us assist you better.
Contact.messageHint: Minimum 20 characters. The more details you provide, the faster we can help.
Contact.privacyNote: Your information is protected and will only be used to respond to your inquiry. Read our Privacy Policy for more details.
Contact.faqDesc: Find instant answers to common questions in our comprehensive Help Center.

Returns.title: Returns & Refunds
Returns.heroSubtitle: Changed your mind? No problem. We make returns simple with free shipping labels and fast refunds.
Returns.freeReturnsDesc: Prepaid shipping labels on all eligible items
Returns.noHassleDesc: Simple online process, no questions asked
Returns.step1Desc: Go to Your Orders in your account and find the item you want to return
Returns.step2Desc: Choose a reason for the return and whether you want a refund or exchange
Returns.step3Desc: Print your free prepaid shipping label and pack the item securely
Returns.step4Desc: Drop off the package at any Econt or Speedy office near you
eligibleItemsList: Unworn, unwashed clothing with original tags attached
Unopened electronics in original sealed packaging
Unused home goods in original condition
Books, movies, and games in sellable condition
Accessories with all original packaging and tags
nonReturnableList: Opened software, games, or digital products
Items marked as final sale or non-returnable
Returns.refundInfoText: Once we receive and inspect your return, we'll process your refund. The time it takes for the refund to appear depends on your payment method:
Returns.readyToReturnDesc: Access your orders to initiate a return. You'll receive a confirmation email with your shipping label.
Returns.importantNoticeText: Items must be returned within 30 days of delivery. Please ensure items are in their original condition with all tags and packaging.
Returns.needHelpDesc: Our support team is available to assist with any return questions.

faqs.q: How long do I have to return an item?
faqs.a: You have 30 days from the delivery date to initiate a return for most items. Some categories like electronics have extended return periods during holidays.
Yes! We provide free prepaid return shipping labels for all eligible returns. Simply print the label and drop off at any authorized shipping location.

faqs.q: When will I receive my refund?
faqs.a: Refunds are processed within 24-48 hours of receiving your return. The funds will appear in your account within 5-10 business days depending on your bank.

faqs.q: Can I exchange instead of return?
faqs.a: Yes, you can request an exchange for a different size or color during the return process. The replacement will be shipped once we receive your return.
